title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4409.5 - Distribution of surcharge revenues
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4409.5 - Distribution of surcharge revenues

State Regulations

All revenues received from the surcharge pursuant to
section 532 of the Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law shall be
distributed in accordance with the provisions of section 532 and, as
applicable, section 516 of such law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4409.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
